transcript:
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan, good evening sir, Ashraf baat kar raha tha.
Executive: Boliye sir ji.
Customer: Vikram sir ye mujhe thoda sa batayenge ye Tarun matlab koi ek aapka buyer hai usko kya problem hai wo complain complain kai baar kiya hua IndiaMART se.
Executive: Problem ye hai sir ki usko ek to business kya hota hai pata nahi hai.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Ye hai.
Customer: 30000 mein usne ye samajh liya hai ki company kharid rakhi hai inhone maine.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Aur second thing ye hai ki unhone jab machine order kari thi tab unhone tube size rakhi thi 5 se 6 mm.
Customer: Achcha achcha.
Executive: Uske according humne machine aur uske hisab se brushes diye hai humne.
Customer: Achcha achcha.
Executive: Ab unki tube ke size wo bol rahe hai ki mujhe to 4 mm ka chahiye.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Ya fir maine bola chalo theek hai wo bhi uska bhi nahi bataya ki brush wagarah to toot gaya unse wo bhi maine fir usko as a customer ethics samjh ke replace karke diya hai without any charge.
Customer: Hmm hmm hmm.
Executive: Abhi unko maine bola ki koi baat nahi sir aapko 4 mm ke brushes chahiye wo aapko wo bhi aapko replace karke de dunga. Ab review hata dijiye. Par unki to wahi ego hai ki chaddi bhi meri padi meri wo bolta hai pehle mujhe bhejiye main check karunga. Uske baad hataunga.
Customer: Achcha ye matlab aisa kuch tha kya jo aapne nylon heat exchanger bheja wo matlab defective tha matlab unka aisa kehna hai isliye puch raha hu main aapse.
Executive: Defective in the sense jaise chala na ho ya kuch aisa.
Executive: Sir main aapko recording bata sakta hu us customer ki unhone khud ne ye bola hai ki aapki machine mein koi dikkat nahi hai. Meri tube ka size 5 mm reh gaya wo maine aapne wo bheja hai brush wo 6 mm ka hai.
Customer: Haan haan haan.
Executive: Aur abhi darshan pehle bhi maine isi customer se meri yahi baat hui hai ki sir koi baat nahi main aapko jo brushes hai wo replace karke de deta hu. Aap review hata dijiye. But wo to wahi hai ki wo chaddi meri padi mein wahi karke baitha hai. To wo cheez to sir aap bhi jante hai fir.
Customer: Haan haan haan.
Customer: Theek hai matlab pata nahi dono hi cheeze likhwa rahe hai IndiaMART se ki wrong saman bhej diya hai aur defective bhi bhej diya hai.
Executive: Aisa nahi hai sir jis customer ko pata nahi business kya hota hai aur ethics kya hote hai na.
Customer: Hmm hmm. Matlab ye problem hai.
Customer: Hmm hmm hmm.
Customer: Achcha 95 80891 isne sir bahut pehle bhi ek bar dala tha complain to October mein na aapko yaad hai.
Executive: Aapko yaad hai to wo Diwali ke time pe jab che din ki chutti thi us time pe available nahi tha.
Customer: Haan haan haan.
Executive: Tab ye achche tarah se hyper ho raha tha ki mera ye ho gaya mera paisa kha gaya.
Customer: Haan haan haan. Ye baar baar alag batata hai kabhi Tony batata hai kabhi Tarun ban jata hai.
Executive: Wahi to keh raha hu na fir jab usko paisa mil gaya ek machine mil gayi fir isne five star rating mein dal diya uska bhi mere paas pada hai screenshot.
Customer: Achcha achcha achcha achcha.
Executive: Isko laga ki abhi mere actually kya hai ki iski tube ID hai 6 mm theek hai.
Customer: Ji sir ji sir. Iski aur isne usi size ke mangaliye brush.
Customer: Ji sir.
Executive: Samajh rahe hai. Tab wo 6 mm ke tube mein abhi aap ye samajhiye ki 6 mm ke tube mein 6 mm ka brush kaise enter hoga.
Customer: Haan to chota chahiye na sir.
Executive: Exactly. Halka matlab usse chota. Wahi 4 mm ka 5 mm ka brush mein chahiye.
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: Ab ye apni galti galti manenge nahi ki maine bola ye ab ye tha ki inko ye ki nahi bhi humne galat bheja hai.
Executive: Aisa hai samajh rahe hai.
Customer: Achcha achcha.
Executive: To pehle bhi ye bol rahe the ki mujhe refund kar do to maine kaha sir refund ka koi process policy hai bhi nahi plus mere machine mein koi issue hua to aap mujhe batayiye main banda bhej ke correct kar dunga. To pehle ye ho raha hai ye ho raha hai wo ho raha hai. Ab fir maine usse us cheez ko mere production head ko live pe leke sab kuch samjha ke kara tab tab is bande ka ye statement badal gaya ki nahi haan ye machine aapka sahi work kar raha hai but aapko jo brush hai wo bada size ka hai.
Customer: Achcha achcha.
Executive: Tab usko to Ashraf ji aap batayiye customer ka chaddi bhi meri padi bhi meri rakhna chahega. To ye to fir aapke liye dhandha bhi risky aapke liye to fir.
Customer: Mujhe na sir kuch agar jaise evidence kuch ya chat vat bhejna hai to mujhe bhejiye ga. Taki backend pe main baat kar saku apne BS complaint team se ki aisa discussion hua tha aur abhi jo hai plus jo buyer hai wo aisi aisi baatein kar raha hai. Hai ki nahi. To main aapko kabhi bhi sir recording recording de sakta hu jab usne ye haan matlab jo bhi hai evidence jo bhi aapke paas.
Customer: Aur kya to sahi rahega.
Executive: Kabhi kabhi hote hai sir kuch kuch customer mil jate hai sir dekho hamesha buyer ek tarike ke nahi hote.
Customer: Nahi nahi main keh raha hu main koi is field mein almost six years six years to ho gaye sales mein main haan aur kya main aisa unethical banda nahi dekha jisko itni achchi samajh nahi aa rahi ki theek hai unse galti ho gayi to wo khud ki galti maan ke hai. In fact hum us cheez ka replacement bhi de rahe hai aisa bhi nahi keh rahe ki hum nahi sir aapko replacement nahi milega kuch nahi milega. Theek hai uske liye sir customer se bolte jati hai koi issue nahi hai.
Customer: To usko ek rai ka pahad banana aur aise faltu hypertenic tone mein baat karna.
Customer: Hmm hmm hmm.
Executive: Aur 30000 deke ye samajh le ki wo customer ke baad ban jaoge to wo to sir usko aise hi banegi. Haan hmm hmm. Fir hum bhi leke baithe hai.
Customer: Sahi baat hai. Wahi cheez hai sir Ashraf ji.
Customer: Nahi theek hai. Baki aap iska screenshot sir bhejh deta hu recording bhi aap suniye.
Customer: Haan mujhe bhej dijiye zara haan main abhi dekhu zara kya majra hai to fir solve karau usko na sir.
Executive: Sure. Theek theek hai okay sir okay thank you sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is complaining about a buyer, Tarun.

- Buyer claims wrong and defective items received.

- Buyer wants a refund.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the situation with the buyer.

- Executive offered to replace the brush.

- Executive will send evidence to the customer.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will review the evidence.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, buyer, defective product, replacement
